title: Add guardrails for auto-routing/auto-creation (rate limits + idempotency)

sections.text: Implement backend safeguards to prevent Jira spam from Issue_Tracker auto-routing/auto-creation by adding per-workspace rate limiting and strict idempotency keys for issue->Jira ticket creation. Ensure retries, webhook replays, and dedupe/cluster updates cannot create duplicate Jira issues or repeatedly re-route ownership. Log and surface blocked attempts with reason codes to support later tuning and auditing.
